column4: what won't break anything ? I'm still not entirely sure what i'm supposed to be doing here. Trying to remove libjpeg62 and install libjpeg8c from source in commandline was the best idea i had. If something simplier would work that'd be great
theadmin : just to make sure you two aren't disagreeing, so the checkinstall thing will work if i masquerade this new package as the old one's name?
hmm. would dpkg know how to revert it if i uninstalled it afterwords?
and there's a way to forcibly just reinstall the older package over itself if that doesnt work, right?
